title: Technology-Integrated Elementary Mathematics Instructional Design: Self-Regulated Learning-Based Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Designing mathematics instruction education that integrates SRL (Self-Regulated Learning) strategies and TPACK (Technological Pedagogical Content Knowledge) competencies in smartphone-based limited environments.

learning_goals: Learners can complete smartphone-based mathematics lesson design plans utilizing self-regulated learning strategies
Learners can develop technology-integrated lesson plans applying at least five of the seven TPACK model components
Learners can metacognitively monitor and adjust their instructional design process through peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
